notes: The following regulations do not apply to the lakes and tributaries of those rivers unless specified. All season dates are inclusive.

rules.notes: Inland Waters. From Sep 1 to Sep 30, no Brook Trout may be retained, and natural bait is prohibited in all waters for all Trout species, including Special Trout Management Areas, except in waters with extended seasons for Trout.

Tidal Waters. From Sep 1 to Sep 30, no Brook Trout may be retained, and natural bait is prohibited in all waters for all Trout species, including Special Trout Management Areas, except in waters with extended seasons for Trout.
Extended Season waters. Regular bag limit applies Apr 1 - Sep 30.
All Smallmouth Bass in this area of the RFA must be retained. Open season coincides with the season for Trout.
rules.area: All waters east of Highway 102 from its junction with Highway 104

rules.notes: All Chain Pickerel must be retained. Open season coincides with the season for a sportfish.
General regulation for White and Yellow Perch.

rules.area: Harrison Lake, Isaac Lake (Cumberland), Shortt's Lake (Colchester)

specialWaters.notes: Downstream from the 246 Highway Bridge at Oliver. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to Apr 14.
Downstream from the 256 Highway Bridge at The Falls. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to Apr 14.
Downstream from the No. 6 Highway bridge, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to Apr 14.
Downstream from the CN Railway bridge at Belmont, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the CN Railway bridge, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the confluence with Callaghan Brook, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the CN Railway bridge, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the confluence with Spencers Brook, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the confluence of the West Branch North River, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the confluence with Matheson Brook, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the confluence with Greenfield Brook, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 15.
Downstream from the bridge near the tree nursery in the Chignecto Game Sanctuary, including tributaries. Closed to all angling Apr 1 to May 14.
Standard regulations.

Special Trout Management Area. Downstream from the CN railway bridge near McKay Siding. Apr 1 to Apr 14, closed to all angling. Apr 15 to May 9 and Jun 11 to Aug 31, any gear permitted. May 10 to Jun 10, single hook lure or artificial fly, natural bait prohibited.

Special Trout Management Area. From CN railway bridge near McKay Siding to highway bridge in Upper Stewiacke. Apr 1 to May 9, closed to all angling. May 10 to Jul 15, single hook lure or artificial fly, no natural bait. Jul 16 to Aug 31, artificial fly only. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.
Special Trout Management Area. Upstream from highway bridge in Upper Stewiacke. Apr 1 to Aug 31, any gear permitted. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.

specialWaters.area: Stewiacke River - Lansdowne to Stewiacke East (Colchester)
specialWaters.notes: Night angling for brown Trout is permitted from the Lansdowne bridge downstream to the bridge in Stewiacke East during the open season.

Special Trout Management Area. Downstream from Mountain Road Bridge (Spencers Bridge). Apr 1 to May 14, catch and release only, artificial fly only. May 15 to Aug 31, any gear permitted. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.
Night angling for brown Trout is permitted upstream from the Mountain Road Bridge (Spencers Bridge) not including tributaries.

Special Trout Management Area. Downstream from Highway 2 bridge at Southampton. Apr 1 to May 14, catch and release only, artificial fly only. May 15 to Aug 15, any gear permitted. Aug 16 to Sep 30, catch and release only, artificial fly only.

Special Trout Management Area. Downstream from Highway 4 Bridge at Wentworth Center. Apr 1 to Apr 14, closed to all angling. Downstream from Barclay Rd. (Main branch) and Greenville Road (West branch) to Kerrs Mills Bridge, single hook lure or artificial fly only, no bait permitted. Sep 1 to Sep 30, all Brook Trout must be released.
